title: Armin Van Buuren: Boundaries Of Imagination (2014) (320kbps) (Ac
description:
Armin Van Buuren: Boundaries Of Imagination (2014) 

                        Trance | Black Hole Recordings 

            320 kbps | MP3 | single | 2014-05-19 | 03:25:47 | 473 Mb


More than a decade ago it was Armin van Buuren's turn to make his mark in the Artist Profile Series. The result was 'Boundaries Of Imagination', Armin van Buuren's first ever CD mixcompilation, which is now remastered and re-released through Black Hole Recordings. Of course by now the whole world knows the name of Armin van Buuren. Five times DJ Mag's # 1 DJ of the World, A State Of Trance radio host and label co-owner of Armada. More than 20 million people tune in to his In State Of Trance radio show every week, his singles, albums and compilations reach top chart positions everywhere and Armin himself performs all over the globe to thousands of enthusiastic fans.
